org.princehouse.mica.lib.abstractions

Class Aggregator<Summary,Aggregate>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.princehouse.mica.base.BaseProtocol
      • org.princehouse.mica.base.FailureDetector
        • org.princehouse.mica.lib.abstractions.Aggregator<Summary,Aggregate>
  • Type Parameters:
    AgClass - Protocol class implementing the aggregator (i.e., the class you are writing)
    Summary -
    Aggregate -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Protocol
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TreeCountNodes

    public abstract class Aggregator<Summary,Aggregate>
extends FailureDetector
    Parametric aggregator class. This can be used to implement any protocol which follows the pattern: 1. Collect summaries from neighbors 2. Compute aggregate function of collected summaries The Aggregator class caches the last known summary from each neighbor. This cache is updated with each gossip exchange, and the aggregator recomputes the aggregate function.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Aggregator

        public Aggregator()

      • Aggregator

        public Aggregator(Protocol.Direction direction)
        Aggregate constructor. The direction of aggregation is given by constants from Protocol.Direction. PUSH : Push summary of initiating gossip node to recipient; compute new remote aggregate PULL : Pull summary of recipient to initiator; compute new local aggregate PUSHPULL: Both
        Parameters:
        overlay - The overlay to gossip along.
        direction - PUSH, PULL, or PUSHPULL
        initialAggregateValue -

      • summaryFilterKeep

        public boolean summaryFilterKeep(Address addr,
                        Summary s)
        If summaryFilterKeep returns false, the specified summary will be purged from the summary cache. Otherwise it is kept. Default behavior is to keep everything.
        Parameters:
        addr -
        s -
